title: Best Service in NYC
text: We returned to New York for our wedding anniversary and were welcomed to 70 Park Avenue with a bottle of champagne from the management. Our room was spacious and clean and we had a view of the Empire State Building from our window. The bed was huge and really comfortable. Bathroom was also a good size for NYC and the L'Occitane toiletries are a really nice touch. Location is good and just a couple of minutes walk from Grand Central. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff in the hotel, we forgot our blackberry charger and within 5 minutes the concierge had located one and sent it up to the room. Would highly recommend.
